languages.text: "От всей души благодарен вам, Ваша Светлость! Буду служить верно, не забуду вашей милости!"

traits.locale_text: "От всей души благодарен вам, Ваша Светлость! Все трубы ваших покоев немедля прикажу отдраить до блеска — и чтобы ни единого алого пятнышка не пропустили!"

languages.text: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"
languages.original_text: "От всей души благодарен вам, Ваша Светлость! Буду служить верно, не забуду вашей милости!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, I'll never forget your mercy!"
"Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, I'll never forget your mercy!"
"Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"
"Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"
"Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"
"Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"
"Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"

languages.text: « Merci du fond du cœur, Votre Seigneurie ! Je vous servirai fidèlement et je n'oublierai jamais votre miséricorde ! »
languages.original_text: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"

traits.locale_text: « Merci du fond du cœur, Votre Seigneurie ! Je vous servirai fidèlement et je n'oublierai jamais votre miséricorde ! »

languages.text: «¡Gracias, mil{mf|ord|ady}, desde lo más profundo de mi corazón! ¡Le serviré con total fidelidad y nunca olvidaré su piedad!».
languages.original_text: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias, mil{mf|ord|ady}, desde lo más profundo de mi corazón! ¡Le serviré con total fidelidad y nunca olvidaré su piedad!».

languages.text: 「心から感謝いたします、陛下！私はあなたに忠実に仕え、あなたのご慈悲を決して忘れません！」
languages.original_text: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"

traits.locale_text: 「心から感謝いたします、陛下！私はあなたに忠実に仕え、あなたのご慈悲を決して忘れません！」

languages.text: “我发自内心地感激您，大人！我一定会忠心耿耿地为您效力！永远不会忘记您的仁慈！”
languages.original_text: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"

traits.locale_text: “我发自内心地感激您，大人！我一定会忠心耿耿地为您效力！永远不会忘记您的仁慈！”

languages.text: "Ich danke Euch von ganzem Herzen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich bin Euch treu ergeben und werde Eure Gnade niemals vergessen!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke Euch von ganzem Herzen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich bin Euch treu ergeben und werde Eure Gnade niemals vergessen!"

languages.text: "Canıgönülden teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi Hazretleri!} Size sadakatle hizmet edeceğim ve merhametinizi asla unutmayacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I'll serve you faithfully, and I'll never forget your mercy!"
